page.title: 04TWO GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: Cock o'Rooster You go around the playground calling "Cock o'Rooster", then someone shouts "All against the wall" and the last against the wall is "It". That person chooses someone and that person tries to dodge across the playground. If you are caught, you choose. The person who caught you stays to help you catch. You continue until everyone is caught. Hopscotch You draw ten squares on the playground with chalk and arrange them so that squares two and three are above one, four above htree and two, five and six above four, seven above five and six, eight and nine above seven and ten above eight and nine. You get a little stone and throw it on the squares.
